description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with this invigorating Mango Jalapeno Margarita Mocktail. The luscious sweetness of ripe mangoes beautifully complements the zesty tang of lime and the subtle heat from the jalapeno.
ingredients: [{"name": "Lime wedges", "units": null, "amount": 4}, {"name": "Salt", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "Ice cubes", "units": "as needed", "amount": null}, {"name": "Club soda", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "Agave syrup", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "Lime juice", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "Jalapeno", "units": null, "amount": 1}, {"name": "Mango", "units": "large", "amount": 1}]
instructions: In a blender, add the diced mango, chopped jalapeno, fresh lime juice, and agave syrup. Blend until the mixture turns smooth and all ingredients are well incorporated. Prepare the glasses by rubbing a lime wedge around each rim. Dip the rim into a plate of salt to create a nicely salted edge. Fill the glasses halfway with ice cubes. Pour the blended mango jalapeno mixture over the ice, filling up to three-quarters of the glass. Top up each glass with club soda, and stir gently to mix. Garnish each glass with a lime wedge on the rim. Serve immediately and enjoy the tropical burst of flavors!
notes: For a spicier mocktail, leave a few seeds in the jalapeno. If fresh mangoes aren't available, feel free to use frozen or canned mangoes in their juice. For an added twist, consider adding a few sprigs of fresh mint or basil to the blender.
